name: Structured
headline: Build data apps with AI
description: Structured is a full-stack platform for building, deploying, and managing interactive data applications. It brings ingestion, storage, transformation, and visualization into a simple SDK, minimizing complexity while maintaining flexibility for both prototyping and production-grade use cases.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:analytics; industry:open-source; industry:data-visualization; location:san-francisco-bay-area

# 
Code, connect and deploy interactive data apps faster than ever.
Ingest, transform, and visualize your data in minutes. No heavy infrastructure. No steep learning curve.
[Get started](https://www.structuredlabs.com/<https:/app.structuredlabs.com/>)[Learn more ‚Üí](https://www.structuredlabs.com/<https:/docs.structuredlabs.com>)

## Make data fun again
Full-stack data solution. All in one box üì¶
SQL Editorexample.sql
SELECTu.id,u.name,COALESCE(SUM(t.revenue),0)
### Assistance
Context-aware help while you code
Preswald understands your entire data stack‚Äîfrom the structure of your tables to the quirks of your ETL logic. Get context-aware autocompletion, intelligent debugging, and real-time suggestions.

### Reliability
Fix problems before they impact production
Test data transformations on local datasets to identify potential issues early. Avoid costly errors in production and minimize the risk of disrupting critical business metrics.
Redundant 'customer_segmentation_v3' model
Detected

Critical
Unused transformation 'calculate_discount_rate'
Detected
Pipeline Healthy 'order_processing_stage'
Healthy
### Efficiency
Find and fix fragmentation
Misaligned, redundant, or overly complex transformations can lead to delays, inconsistent outputs, and costly maintenance. Stop this in its tracks.
Ingestion
5,000,000 rows
Transformation
4,800,000 rows
Loading
4,500,000 rows
Visualization
4,000,000 rows
### Validation
Simulate production environments
Replicate real production environments to test your data and catch issues before they arise. Catch issues early. Save time and resources.
```
## üìà Revenue Growth
- **Desc**: YoY revenue % growth
- **Src**: Transactions üõí
- **Formula**: `(Current - Prev) / Prev`
- **Freq**: Monthly üìÖ
```

```
## üë• Active Users
- **Desc**: Users with at least one activity
- **Src**: Users üôã‍‚ôÇÔ∏èüôã‍‚ôÄÔ∏è
- **Formula**: `COUNT(DISTINCT user_id)`
- **Freq**: Daily üïí
```

### Documentation
No more doc-writing stress
Automatically generate clear and accurate documentation from your code, including data lineage, transformation logic, and dataset context.
## üòé Too cool for data chaos
Analytics in code, not in 20 different tools
Preswald is designed to help you create a lightweight, flexible analytics stack‚Äîall in code and ready to be shaped into whatever you need.
Do more with the team you have
    You don't need to hire a big team or buy a patchwork of SaaS tools to get the simple metrics and numbers you need right away. Uplevel your existing talent with Preswald.
Build trust in your data
    Data quality issues can make your team doubt the numbers. Preswald helps you build trust in your data. Catch issues early and easily understand what‚Äôs going on.
Cut costs by catching issues early
    Broken pipelines wreck dashboards, mess up metrics, and waste everyone's time. Preswald catches issues before they go live, saving you from costly production firefights and keeping your data reliable.
Avoid knowledge bottlenecks
    Tribal knowledge shouldn't be the backbone of your data stack. Preswald generates clear, automatic documentation, so anyone can step in and keep things running.
## Building Together
Discover how we‚Äôre making a difference together
> ‚ÄúOne of the biggest issues in the modern tech stack is a lack of a central source of truth when it comes to data definitions. When this does exist, it‚Äôs a pain to work with or remember where to access it. Having an AI enabled solution that you can ‚Äúspeak to‚Äù will be a game changer and definitely reduce the noise and bloat that most systems experience as a result of siloed information. I love the idea of a ‚Äúphone a friend‚Äù accessible via slack to make sure I‚Äôm using the data at my disposal well.‚Äù
![](https://www.structuredlabs.com/images/testimonials/testimonial-headshot-5.png)
Rahil Jetly
@rahiljetly
> ‚ÄúImagine a world where end users can make data requests and receive results directly in Slack, bypassing the need for slide decks, CRMs, or BI tools for one-off reports. This solution would accelerate data delivery, improve data accessibility, and ensure consistent data definitions.‚Äù
![](https://www.structuredlabs.com/images/testimonials/testimonial-headshot-2.png)
Drake Senter
@drakesenter
> ‚ÄúKeeping definitions of KPI's and other metrics consistent across a team is always a challenge. Structured makes it much easier to ensure you're all driving towards the same goals with a shared understanding of how to measure success.‚Äù
![](https://www.structuredlabs.com/images/testimonials/testimonial-headshot-4.png)
Akash Kashyap
@akashkashyap
> ‚ÄúThe hardest part about using metrics isn‚Äôt the data, it‚Äôs agreeing on what the data represents. Structured standardizes metrics definitions and makes everyone‚Äôs life easier.‚Äù
![](https://www.structuredlabs.com/images/testimonials/testimonial-headshot-6.png)
Natan Vidra
@natanvidra
> ‚ÄúMetrics are only useful if everyone agrees on what they mean. Structured standardizes definitions and solves a lot of wasted time and miscommunication.‚Äù
![](https://www.structuredlabs.com/images/testimonials/testimonial-headshot-1.png)
Andrew Hurst
@andrewhurst
> ‚ÄúAs a startup, it can be challenging to balance the need for immediate growth with the long-term requirements for robust data management. Structured's automated metric lineage proves to be an essential resource for this problem. It seamlessly tracks the evolutions in your assumptions/metrics while ensuring that the entire team remains aligned in their understanding of the key decision-making metrics.‚Äù
![](https://www.structuredlabs.com/images/testimonials/chrisjun.png)
Chris Jun
@chrisjun
> ‚ÄúStructured has made it easier for us to set and track our KPIs while also improving data discovery within our team. Everything is clear and accessible, so we know where we stand and can make faster, better decisions to hit our goals.‚Äù
![](https://www.structuredlabs.com/images/testimonials/testimonial-headshot-3.png)
Akshay Chalana
@akshaychalana

generated_description:
**Structured: Simplifying Data Apps with AI**

**Overview**  
Founded in 2023 and hailing from Y Combinator Batch S23, Structured is a fresh face in the technology scene, located in San Francisco. With a compact yet talented team of three, they're set on a mission: building data applications that harness the power of AI. You can check them out at [structuredlabs.com](https://www.structuredlabs.com/).

**What They Do**  
Structured operates as a full-stack platform designed for constructing, deploying, and managing interactive data applications. Their solution identifies the common pain points in data manipulation‚Äîlike ingestion, storage, transformation, and visualization‚Äîand wraps them into a user-friendly SDK. The goal? Minimize complexity for developers while retaining the flexibility needed for both rapid prototyping and robust production use cases.

**Key Features**  
- **Integrated Workflow**: Built to streamline the entire data pipeline process, allowing users to ingest, transform, and visualize data in a matter of minutes without heavy infrastructure or a steep learning curve.
- **AI-Powered Suggestions**: Their platform, utilizing its assistant ‚ÄúPreswald,‚Äù provides context-aware help, suggesting solutions for common data processing issues and generating clear documentation to facilitate ease of use.
- **Team Empowerment**: Designed to upskill current teams rather than requiring expensive hires, it helps teams manage data more effectively without the hassle of using multiple disparate tools.

**Why It Matters**  
Structured addresses a critical challenge in modern tech stacks: the fragmented nature of data management. They offer a centralized solution for dealing with data definitions, KPIs, and transformation logic‚Äîessentially reducing chaos and improving clarity for teams. 

**Recent Highlights**  
- Structured has been recognized and chosen to showcase its innovation at the TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 Startup Battlefield.
- They recently achieved SOC 2 Type 1 compliance, underscoring their commitment to security and data protection.
- The company has also had the thrill of being featured in Times Square, a testament to their growing presence in the tech industry.

**In Conclusion**  
Structured isn‚Äôt just building another coding platform; they are reshaping how data applications are formed and utilized. With their AI-integration and a keen focus on enhancing developer efficiency, they're poised to make significant waves in the data analytics sector. If you're tired of juggling various tools and want to simplify your data processes, Structured might just be the ally you need.
